thread.title: Adele's New Album Has a Release Date and Cover Art
thread.title_full: Adele's New Album Has a Release Date and Cover Art

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: Adele's New Album Has a Release Date and Cover Art
text:
Adele has revealed that her upcoming album 25 will be released Nov. 20. The singer revealed the date via an Instagram post Thursday.
25 out November 20th
A photo posted by @adele on Oct 22, 2015 at 6:55am PDT
 The news follows the announcement that Nick Grimshaw will premiere Adele's new single on his BBC Radio 1 Breakfast Show next week. The singer confirmed that her third studio album is called 25 earlier this week.
She explained that fans can expect a "make-up album" that will be about "making up for everything I ever did and never did." "It is about getting to know who I've become without realising," Adele added. "And I'm so sorry it took so long, but you know, life happened." Fans have been braced for Adele's return since Sunday, when the star seemed to drop a teaser of new music during an X Factor ad break .
